data.persona: I am a castaway.  I fell from aboard a ship and washed up ashore at this village.  The villagers took me in and brought me to the town's doctor.
data.description:
You are in the Island.
This island is located in the center of a lake. It is smaller than a ship and covered in moss.
There's a Bone and a moss here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to escape the constable who knows I am from my last village. He will turn me in.
data.mid_motivation: I need to get off this island after I am healed.
data.long_motivation: I need to find safe passage to another island or realm where no one knows of me nor my crimes...

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go the island to look for safe transport.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield a large bone I find on the ground after I see the constable coming. He's coming to arrest me to take me back to my old village.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the marketplace to hide from the constable. It's no use. He's found me and is trying to corner me.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the boat docks as fast I can to stowaway aboard another ship before the constable can regain consciousness.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat food scraps in the cargo hold of a nearby ship.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go sleep in the ship's cargo hold, praying that this ship's destination is better than the last.
